Package controller

Class UpdateCustomer

java.lang.Object
controller.UpdateCustomer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Navigable, SQLQuery, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UpdateCustomer extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, Navigable, SQLQuery
Controller for updating pre-existing customers from the client_schedule.customers database table and displaying them on the landing page.
